pullrequest.title: Don't build gazebo executable on Windows for now, since it doesn't compile

content.raw: There are multiple problems when building in Release mode. If you `nmake gzserver`, you'll run into the FreeImage linking error first. However, with a plain `nmake`, I run into this error first. Since the tutorial says to do a plain `nmake`, I think this is a good first step. I would propose to start fixing the FreeImage linking in a separate pull request.
content.html: There are multiple problems when building in Release mode. If you nmake gzserver, you'll run into the FreeImage linking error first. However, with a plain nmake, I run into this error first. Since the tutorial says to do a plain nmake, I think this is a good first step. I would propose to start fixing the FreeImage linking in a separate pull request.
